title: Alex Borstein’s Embarrassing Moment from Catwoman | io9 Interview

description:
Each day, messages from Nigerian princes, peddlers of wonder drugs and promoters of can’t-miss investments choke email inboxes. Improvements to spam filters only seem to inspire new techniques to break through the protections.

title: 12 of Twitter's Best Jokes and Memes About Elon Musk's Blue Check Apocalypse
description:
Since the beginning of Elon Musk’s reign at Twitter, he’s threatened to remove the legacy verification—signified by a white check in a blue circle beside the account name—that predated his tenure. Musk even set April 1st as the date for the purge, which came and went without any changes, either because of ineptitude…
